metadata.source: Colorado Digital Service - Enhanced catalog with cleaned taxonomy, additional services from web research

services.name: Access College in Colorado planning resources
services.description: Access comprehensive resources and tools to help plan for college education in Colorado, including information about financial aid, college selection, and career planning.

services.name: Access the Driver's License and ID Card Center
services.description: Access online services for driver's licenses and identification cards, including renewals, replacements, and updates to personal information.

services.name: Add emergency contacts to your driver's license or state ID record
services.description: Add or update emergency contact information to your Colorado driver's license or state identification card record for use in emergency situations.

services.name: Apply for an educator license
services.description: Submit an application for a Colorado educator license, including teaching, administrative, and special service provider licenses.

services.name: Apply for Health First Colorado and Child Health Plan Plus
services.description: Apply for Colorado's Medicaid program (Health First Colorado) and Child Health Plan Plus (CHP+) to access health coverage for eligible individuals and families.
services.department: Department of Health Care Policy & Financing

services.name: Apply for the College Opportunity Fund
services.description: Apply for the College Opportunity Fund (COF) stipend, which provides state financial support to eligible undergraduate students attending participating Colorado colleges.

services.name: Apply online for a Work Opportunity Tax Credit
services.description: Submit an online application for the Work Opportunity Tax Credit, a federal tax credit available to employers who hire individuals from specific target groups.

services.name: Apply to be a methamphetamine labs cleanup instructor or training provider
services.description: Submit an application to become certified as an instructor or training provider for methamphetamine laboratory cleanup procedures and safety protocols.

services.name: Begin health facility licensing process
services.description: Start the process of obtaining a license to operate a healthcare facility in Colorado, including hospitals, nursing homes, and other medical facilities.

services.name: Bid on work with the state
services.description: Access and bid on state government contract opportunities through Colorado's procurement system.

services.name: Birth, death and other vital records
services.description: Request and obtain official vital records including birth certificates, death certificates, marriage licenses, and other important documents.

services.name: Calculate, file & pay worker's compensation surcharge
services.description: Calculate and submit required worker's compensation surcharge payments for Colorado businesses with employees.

services.name: Center for Health and Environmental Data
services.description: Access comprehensive health and environmental data resources, including statistics, reports, and analysis tools for Colorado public health information.

services.name: Change your address/name notification on record with Gaming officials
services.description: Update your personal information with the Colorado Division of Gaming, ensuring compliance with gaming regulations and maintaining accurate licensee records.

services.name: Check the status of a tax refund
services.description: Track the status of your Colorado state tax refund and estimated delivery date online.

services.name: Colorado Child Support Services Application
services.description: Apply for child support services, including assistance with establishing paternity, locating non-custodial parents, and enforcing support orders.

services.name: Colorado Cold Case Database
services.description: Access information about unsolved criminal cases in Colorado, including homicides, missing persons, and unidentified remains.

services.name: Search for convicted sex offenders in the state of Colorado
services.description: Access the Colorado sex offender registry to search for registered sex offenders by name or location.

services.name: Colorado Division of Professions and Occupations Online Services Portal
services.description: Access licensing and registration services for various professions and occupations regulated by the state of Colorado.

services.name: Colorado Courts
services.description: Access Colorado judicial branch services, including court records, forms, and case information.

services.name: Colorado Law Help
services.description: Access free legal information and resources for Colorado residents, including forms, guides, and referrals to legal services.

services.name: Report telemarketing fraud & register for Colorado's No-Call List
services.description: Register your phone number on Colorado's No-Call List and report unwanted telemarketing calls or suspected fraud.

services.name: Colorado Nutrition Portal
services.description: Access nutrition resources, education materials, and food assistance program information for Colorado residents.

services.name: Colorado PEAK
services.description: Apply for and manage public assistance benefits including food, cash, and medical assistance through this online portal.
services.department: Colorado Department of Health Care Policy & Financing

services.name: Colorado QuitLine
services.description: Access free support services and resources to help Colorado residents quit tobacco use, including coaching, nicotine replacement therapy, and online tools.

services.name: Colorado Shines
services.description: Find and compare licensed child care providers, access early learning resources, and get information about child care quality ratings.

services.name: Colorado Volunteer Mobilizer
services.description: Connect with volunteer opportunities in public health and emergency response throughout Colorado.

services.name: Connect for Health Colorado
services.description: Shop for and enroll in health insurance plans through Colorado's official health insurance marketplace.

services.name: Connecting Colorado
services.description: Search for jobs, create resumes, and connect with employers through Colorado's official job search website.

services.name: Control noxious weeds
services.description: Access information and resources for identifying and controlling noxious weeds in Colorado, including regulations and management plans.

services.name: Correctional Populations Data
services.description: Access statistics and reports about Colorado's correctional populations, including inmate demographics, facility populations, and recidivism rates.

services.name: Crime Statistics
services.description: View and analyze crime statistics for Colorado, including reported crimes, arrests, and law enforcement data.

services.name: Division of Local Government
services.description: Access resources and support for local governments, including technical assistance, financial programs, and community development services.

services.name: Driver License and ID Card Renewal
services.description: Renew your Colorado driver license or identification card online, including options for replacing lost or damaged cards.

services.name: EMS Provider Certification
services.description: Apply for or renew Emergency Medical Services provider certifications, including EMTs and paramedics.

services.name: Explore and file business forms
services.description: Access and submit required business forms and filings with the Colorado Secretary of State's office.

services.name: Explore solid waste forms and applications
services.description: Access forms and applications related to solid waste management, including permits for facilities and operations.

services.name: Explore the Colorado Fishing Atlas
services.description: Access an interactive map showing fishing locations, species information, and regulations across Colorado.

services.name: Explore the Colorado Hunting Atlas
services.description: Access an interactive map showing hunting areas, species information, and regulations across Colorado.

services.name: Explore veterans employment resources
services.description: Access employment resources and services specifically designed for veterans, including job search assistance and training programs.

services.name: File a fraud report form
services.description: Submit a report about suspected fraud, including consumer fraud, identity theft, and other types of financial fraud.

services.name: File an online crash report
services.description: Submit a traffic accident report online for non-injury crashes that meet specific criteria.

services.name: File your state income taxes online
services.description: Submit your Colorado state income tax return electronically, including options for direct deposit of refunds.

services.name: Find a child car seat fitting station by county
services.description: Locate certified child car seat inspection stations to ensure proper installation and safety of your child's car seat.

services.name: Find a DMV location
services.description: Search for Colorado Department of Motor Vehicles offices by location and view available services at each office.

services.name: Find a driving class
services.description: Search for approved driver education programs and defensive driving courses in Colorado.

services.name: Find a WIC Clinic
services.description: Locate Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) clinics providing nutrition education and support services throughout Colorado.

services.name: Find a Women's Wellness Center
services.description: Locate centers providing women's health services, including preventive care, screenings, and wellness programs.

services.name: Find a workforce center
services.description: Locate Colorado workforce centers offering employment services, job training, and career resources.

services.name: Find active water rights calls
services.description: Access information about current water rights calls and administration in Colorado's water districts.

services.name: Find an Inmate
services.description: Search for individuals currently incarcerated in Colorado's correctional facilities and access basic inmate information.

services.name: Find and Compare Health Facilities
services.description: Search and compare licensed healthcare facilities in Colorado, including quality ratings and inspection reports.

services.name: Find health facilities by type and by city or county
services.description: Search for specific types of healthcare facilities in your area, including hospitals, clinics, and long-term care facilities.

services.name: Find job fairs / events
services.description: Find upcoming job fairs and career events throughout Colorado, including virtual and in-person opportunities.

services.name: Find out if a site is contaminated
services.description: Search for information about contaminated sites in Colorado, including cleanup status and environmental assessments.

services.name: Get copies of occupational school student transcripts
services.description: Request copies of transcripts from closed occupational schools in Colorado.

services.name: Get Vaccinated
services.description: Access information about vaccinations, including locations, schedules, and requirements for Colorado residents.

services.name: Governor's Dashboard
services.description: View key performance metrics and data about Colorado state government operations and initiatives.

services.name: Health First Colorado Add-A-Baby Emergent Request Form
services.description: Submit an emergency request to add a newborn to existing Health First Colorado (Medicaid) coverage.
services.department: Department of Health Care Policy & Financing

services.name: HIV Linkage to Care
services.description: Connect with HIV care services, including medical treatment, support services, and insurance assistance.

services.name: Learn about animal importing
services.description: Access requirements and regulations for importing animals into Colorado, including permits, health certificates, and testing requirements.

services.name: Learn about industrial hemp (not marijuana)
services.description: Access information about Colorado's industrial hemp program, including regulations, licensing, and cultivation requirements.

services.name: Learn about pet-animal care facility operation and oversight
services.description: Access information about operating and maintaining compliance for pet-animal care facilities in Colorado.

services.name: Learn About WIC
services.description: Learn about the Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) program, including eligibility requirements and available benefits.

services.name: License a measurement standards device
services.description: Apply for licenses and certifications for commercial measurement devices used in trade or commerce.

services.name: Locate Medicaid and Child Health Plan Plus providers
services.description: Find healthcare providers who accept Medicaid and Child Health Plan Plus (CHP+) insurance in your area.
services.department: Department of Health Care Policy & Financing

services.name: Make a camping reservation
services.description: Reserve campsites at Colorado state parks and recreation areas, including options for RV, tent, and cabin camping.

services.name: Make a Department of Corrections request for records
services.description: Submit requests for records related to current or former inmates in Colorado's correctional system.

services.name: Make a hazardous materials public records request
services.description: Request public records related to hazardous materials incidents, storage, and transportation in Colorado.

services.name: Manage livestock brands
services.description: Register, renew, or transfer livestock brands used to identify cattle and other livestock in Colorado.

services.name: Manage my tax account
services.description: Access and manage your Colorado tax accounts, including filing returns, making payments, and viewing account history.

services.name: Manage or renew your real estate license
services.description: Maintain your Colorado real estate license, including renewals, updates to personal information, and continuing education requirements.

services.name: Manage your insurance producer license
services.description: Maintain your Colorado insurance producer license, including renewals, continuing education requirements, and updates to personal information.

services.name: MyBizColorado
services.description: Access a one-stop portal for starting and managing a business in Colorado, including registrations, licenses, and permits.

services.name: MyUI Employer
services.description: Access unemployment insurance services for employers, including filing reports, making payments, and managing accounts.

services.name: MyUI+
services.description: Access unemployment insurance services for claimants, including filing claims, requesting payments, and managing benefits.

services.name: Notify gaming officials of an arrest
services.description: Report arrests or criminal charges to the Colorado Division of Gaming as required for licensed gaming employees.

services.name: Pay a City of Denver parking ticket
services.description: Pay or dispute parking tickets issued within the City and County of Denver.

services.name: Pay a debt owed to the State of Colorado
services.description: Make payments on debts owed to Colorado state agencies, including fines, fees, and other obligations.

services.name: Pay taxes online
services.description: Submit payments for various Colorado state taxes, including income tax, sales tax, and business taxes.

services.name: Pay your boiler inspection invoice online
services.description: Pay fees associated with boiler inspections conducted by the Division of Oil and Public Safety.

services.name: Pay your petroleum tank invoice online
services.description: Pay fees related to petroleum storage tank permits and inspections in Colorado.

services.name: Purchase a Colorado non-resident off-highway vehicle permit online
services.description: Buy permits for non-residents to operate off-highway vehicles on designated trails and areas in Colorado.

services.name: Purchase a fishing license online
services.description: Buy Colorado fishing licenses, including annual, short-term, and combination licenses for residents and non-residents.

services.name: Purchase a hunting license online
services.description: Buy Colorado hunting licenses, including big game, small game, and combination licenses for residents and non-residents.

services.name: Purchase Colorado State Parks gift certificates
services.description: Buy gift certificates that can be used for park passes, camping reservations, and other state park amenities.

services.name: Purchase your annual parks pass online
services.description: Buy an annual pass for entry to Colorado state parks, including options for multiple vehicles and aspen leaf passes for seniors.

services.name: Register for electronic funds transfer
services.description: Set up electronic funds transfer for tax payments and other financial transactions with Colorado state agencies.

services.name: Register for hazardous waste workshops and training
services.description: Sign up for training sessions on hazardous waste management, regulations, and compliance requirements.

services.name: Register for real time alerts from CDOT
services.description: Sign up for notifications about road conditions, closures, and construction from the Colorado Department of Transportation.

services.name: Register to vote
services.description: Register to vote in Colorado elections, update your voter registration information, or check your registration status.

services.name: Renew an ag-related license with AgLicense
services.description: Renew various agricultural licenses and permits through Colorado's online agricultural licensing system.

services.name: Renew your boat registration online
services.description: Complete annual boat registration renewals for vessels registered in Colorado.

services.name: Renew your driver license, permit, or ID online
services.description: Complete renewals for Colorado driver licenses, learner permits, and identification cards through the online system.

services.name: Renew your OHV registration online
services.description: Complete registration renewals for off-highway vehicles (OHVs) registered in Colorado.

services.name: Renew your snowmobile registration online
services.description: Complete registration renewals for snowmobiles registered in Colorado.

services.name: Search agriculture & livestock statistics
services.description: Access comprehensive data and reports about Colorado's agricultural production, livestock numbers, and market trends through searchable statistical databases.

services.name: Search for an oil and gas facility
services.description: Search and locate information about oil and gas facilities throughout Colorado, including well locations, operator details, and compliance records.

services.name: Search for business records
services.description: Search and access official business registration records, including articles of incorporation, trade names, and other business filings in Colorado.

services.name: Search for oil and gas drilling permits
services.description: Access information about oil and gas drilling permits in Colorado, including applications, approvals, and permit status updates.

services.name: Search for Veterans Service Officers by county
services.description: Locate county Veterans Service Officers who provide free assistance to veterans, their dependents, and survivors in obtaining veterans benefits.
services.department: Department of Military and Veterans Affairs

services.name: Search the Colorado State Publications Library catalog
services.description: Search and access official state government publications, documents, and reports through the digital repository and library catalog system.

services.name: Search water diversions data
services.description: Access and analyze data about water diversions in Colorado, including water rights, usage statistics, and diversion records.

services.name: Search water rights data
services.description: Search and retrieve information about water rights in Colorado, including ownership records, priority dates, and water court decrees.

services.name: Second Chance
services.description: Access resources and support services for individuals seeking to reenter society after incarceration, including employment assistance and rehabilitation programs.

services.name: Sign up for The Scoop e-newsletter
services.description: Subscribe to receive regular updates about Colorado education news, policy changes, and resources for educators and administrators.

services.name: Sign up to receive School Safety Newsletter e-mails
services.description: Subscribe to receive regular updates about school safety initiatives, resources, and best practices for creating secure educational environments in Colorado.

services.name: State Demography Office Dashboard
services.description: Access interactive tools and data visualizations showing Colorado population trends, demographics, and economic indicators for planning and analysis.

services.name: State of Colorado Job Opportunities
services.description: Search and apply for employment opportunities with Colorado state government agencies, including full-time, part-time, and temporary positions.

services.name: Subscribe to receive tax news
services.description: Sign up for email updates about Colorado tax law changes, filing deadlines, and other important tax-related information for individuals and businesses.

services.name: Subscribe to Safe2Tell
services.description: Join the anonymous reporting system that allows students, parents, and community members to report safety concerns in Colorado schools.

services.name: Access TobaccoFreeCO resources
services.description: Access resources, tools, and support for tobacco prevention and cessation, including educational materials and quit smoking assistance programs.

services.name: Transparency Online Project
services.description: Access detailed information about state government spending, contracts, and financial transactions through an interactive transparency portal.

services.name: Vehicle Registration Renewal
services.description: Complete annual vehicle registration renewals online, including payment of fees and taxes for cars, trucks, and other vehicles registered in Colorado.

services.name: Verify a Colorado Professional or Business License
services.description: Check the status and validity of professional licenses and business registrations issued by Colorado state agencies.

services.name: Verify an EMS provider's certification
services.description: Verify the certification status of Emergency Medical Services providers in Colorado, including EMTs and paramedics.

services.name: View information for truckers
services.description: Access essential information for commercial truck drivers operating in Colorado, including regulations, routes, and restrictions.

services.name: View parks by activities, facilities, accessibility and conditions
services.description: Search and explore Colorado state parks based on available activities, amenities, accessibility features, and current conditions.

services.name: View road conditions throughout the state
services.description: Access real-time information about road conditions across Colorado, including weather impacts, construction, and travel alerts.

services.name: View road work throughout the state
services.description: Find information about current and planned road construction projects throughout Colorado, including timelines and traffic impacts.

services.name: View speeds throughout the state
services.description: Access real-time traffic speed information for major highways and roads across Colorado.

services.name: View state wildlife areas by county, hunting, fishing, recreation, and GMU
services.description: Explore Colorado's state wildlife areas searchable by location, available activities, and Game Management Unit designations.

services.name: View travel alerts throughout the state
services.description: Access current travel alerts and advisories affecting Colorado highways and transportation systems.

services.name: View where your tax dollars go with Colorado Tax Tracks
services.description: Explore interactive visualizations showing how Colorado tax revenue is collected and spent across different government programs and services.

services.name: Workers' Compensation Benefits Calculator
services.description: Calculate potential workers' compensation benefits based on wages and injury information for Colorado workers.

services.name: Your CDOT Calculator
services.description: Calculate transportation costs and impacts using tools provided by the Colorado Department of Transportation.

services.name: Report suspicious activity
services.description: Submit reports about suspicious activities or potential threats to public safety through Colorado's online reporting system.

services.name: Request motor vehicle/powersports records
services.description: Access and request official records related to motor vehicles and powersports vehicles registered in Colorado.

services.name: Request public records through the Colorado Open Records Act
services.description: Submit requests for public records from Colorado state agencies under the Colorado Open Records Act (CORA).

services.name: Revenue Online
services.description: Access Colorado's online tax services portal to file returns, make payments, and manage tax accounts for individuals and businesses.

services.name: SchoolView
services.description: Access comprehensive data and reports about Colorado schools, including performance metrics, enrollment statistics, and educational programs.

services.name: Request a military retirement letter from the Governor
services.description: Request an official letter from the Governor of Colorado recognizing military retirement service.

services.name: Safe2Tell
services.description: Submit anonymous tips about safety concerns in Colorado schools through the Safe2Tell reporting system.

services.name: Request a biocontrol bug
services.description: Apply to receive biological control insects for managing noxious weeds and invasive plants in Colorado.

services.name: Report employer fraud
services.description: Submit reports about suspected employer fraud, including unemployment insurance fraud, worker misclassification, and labor law violations.

services.name: Request information about K-12 education in Colorado
services.description: Access comprehensive information about Colorado's K-12 education system, including academic standards, school choice options, and student support services.

services.name: Review Colorado Department of Public Safety rules in development
services.description: Access and review proposed rules and regulations being developed by the Department of Public Safety, including opportunities for public comment.

services.name: Review limited license draw results and preference point status
services.description: Check results from limited license draws for hunting and accumulate preference points for future license applications.

services.name: Review resources for commercial pesticide applicators
services.description: Access resources and guidelines for commercial pesticide application, including licensing requirements, safety protocols, and best practices.

services.name: Schedule a DMV appointment
services.description: Book appointments online for various DMV services, including driver license, identification cards, and vehicle registration transactions.

services.name: Colorado Energy Savings Navigator
services.description: This service provides information or access to Colorado Energy Savings Navigator.

services.description: This service provides information or access to Explore veterans employment resources (DMVA).

services.description: This service provides information or access to Explore veterans employment resources (CDLE).

services.description: This service provides information or access to Get free help for mental health or substance use right now.

services.description: This service provides information or access to Get free youth therapy.

services.description: This service provides information or access to Get help for mental health, drug, or alcohol use in Colorado.

services.name: Get help for substance use for pregnant and parenting moms
services.description: This service provides information or access to Get help for substance use for pregnant and parenting moms.

services.description: This service provides information or access to Governor’s Dashboard.

services.name: Learn about behavioral healthcare access, funding, and workforce
services.description: This service provides information or access to Learn about behavioral healthcare access, funding, and workforce.

services.name: The myColorado App
services.description: This service provides information or access to The myColorado App.

services.name: myColorado Digital ID
services.description: Get a digital version of your Colorado driver license or state ID on your phone. Use it for age verification, traffic stops, and at TSA checkpoints.

services.name: DMV Anywhere Online Services
services.description: Complete DMV transactions online including driver license renewal, address changes, and instruction permit tests from anywhere with internet access.

services.name: MV Express Kiosk Vehicle Registration
services.description: Renew your vehicle registration in under 2 minutes at self-service kiosks located at grocery stores and other locations throughout Colorado.

services.name: MyCOBenefits Mobile App
services.description: Apply for and manage SNAP, Medicaid, and other public assistance benefits from your smartphone using the official Colorado benefits app.

services.name: Online Instruction Permit Test
services.description: Take your Colorado instruction permit test online from home with a webcam. Available 24/7 for ages 15 and older.

services.name: DORA Professional License Lookup
services.description: Verify the license status of doctors, nurses, real estate agents, contractors, and other licensed professionals in Colorado.

services.name: DPO Online Licensing System
services.description: Apply for, renew, or manage professional licenses including pharmacy, nursing, real estate, and many other regulated professions.

services.name: New to Colorado Checklist
services.description: Complete checklist and resources for new Colorado residents including driver license transfer, vehicle registration, and voter registration requirements.

services.name: Hunger Free Colorado Hotline
services.description: Get free help applying for SNAP food assistance benefits. Call 855-855-4626 for phone or in-person application assistance.

services.name: Colorado Digital ID Verifier
services.description: Verify the authenticity of Colorado Digital IDs using the myColorado app. Scan QR codes to confirm identity without sharing sensitive data.

services.name: Apply to be a methamphetamine labs cleanup instructor
services.description: Submit an online application to become a certified instructor or training provider for meth lab cleanup in Colorado.
services.department: Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment

services.name: Change your address/name notification for Gaming
services.description: Notify the Colorado Division of Gaming when you change your address or legal name so your records stay current.

services.name: Search for convicted sex offenders
services.description: Use this online search tool to find information about convicted sex offenders registered in the state of Colorado.

services.name: DPO Online Services Portal
services.description: Access the Division of Professions and Occupations portal to apply for, renew, reinstate or verify professional and business licenses.

services.name: Report telemarketing fraud & register for No-Call List
services.description: Report telemarketing fraud and register your number on Colorado’s No‑Call List to block unsolicited calls.

services.name: Learn about pet-animal care facility operation
services.description: Find information and resources on operating a licensed pet animal care facility in Colorado, including regulations and oversight.

services.name: Purchase a Colorado non-resident OHV permit
services.description: Purchase a permit for non‑residents to operate off‑highway vehicles (OHVs) on Colorado public lands.

services.name: Register for hazardous waste workshops
services.description: Sign up for Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment workshops on managing hazardous waste.
services.department: Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment

services.name: Search the Colorado State Publications Library
services.description: Search the Colorado State Publications Library catalog for state agency publications and documents.

services.name: Request public records through CORA
services.description: Submit a request for Colorado public records under the Colorado Open Records Act (CORA).

services.name: Review CDPS rules in development
services.description: Review and comment on Colorado Department of Public Safety rules that are currently in development.

services.name: CPW Digital Licenses
services.description: Access and manage your Colorado Parks and Wildlife digital hunting and fishing licenses via the CPW app or online portal.

services.name: Keep Colorado Wild Pass
services.description: Learn about and purchase the Keep Colorado Wild Pass, which provides an annual pass for Colorado state parks as part of your vehicle registration.

services.name: Secure Transportation Service Licensing
services.description: Apply for or renew a secure transportation service license, required for behavioral health secure transport providers.
services.department: Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment

services.name: Colorado Cannabis Business Office
services.description: Access resources from the Cannabis Business Office, including funding programs, for entrepreneurs in Colorado’s cannabis industry.
services.department: Colorado Office of Economic Development and International Trade

services.name: Driving Records
services.description: Access your driving history record online, including information about moving violations and points.

services.name: Driver Monitoring
services.description: Enroll in a monitoring service to receive notifications of changes to a driver’s license status or driving record.

services.name: Gambling Intercept Payment
services.description: Make payments for gambling intercept obligations owed to the State of Colorado through the online portal.

services.name: Motor Vehicle Verification System
services.description: Verify Colorado motor vehicle and powersports ownership and lien information using the Motor Vehicle Verification System.

services.name: Colorado Works (TANF)
services.description: Apply for Colorado Works, the state’s Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF) program that provides monthly cash assistance and employment support to families with children.

services.name: Low-income Energy Assistance Program (LEAP)
services.description: Apply for the Low‑income Energy Assistance Program, which helps eligible households pay winter home heating costs.

services.name: Colorado Employment First
services.description: Participate in Employment First, Colorado’s SNAP Employment and Training program, which helps SNAP recipients gain skills, training and work experience.

services.name: ReHire Colorado
services.description: Apply for ReHire Colorado, a transitional employment program that helps individuals facing barriers to employment gain paid work and job skills training.

services.name: Senior Community Service Employment Program (SCSEP)
services.description: Apply for the SCSEP, which provides paid community service training positions for low‑income adults aged 55 or older seeking employment.

services.name: Training to Career Pathways
services.description: Find free job training opportunities in fields like health care, transportation and early childhood for participants in Colorado Works, Employment First and related programs.

services.name: CW STEP (Colorado Works Subsidized Training & Employment Program)
services.description: Participate in CW STEP, which provides subsidized employment, apprenticeships and on‑the‑job training to help Colorado Works participants achieve permanent employment.

services.name: Colorado Healthy Choice Waiver
services.description: Learn about the Healthy Choice Waiver, a program that restricts the purchase of soft drinks with SNAP benefits to promote healthier choices among participants.

services.name: Colorado SNAP Produce Bonus
services.description: Get reimbursed up to $60 per month when you purchase eligible fruits and vegetables at participating retailers with SNAP benefits.

services.name: SNAP-Ed (Nutrition Education & Obesity Prevention)
services.description: Access SNAP‑Ed resources that teach families how to buy and prepare healthy foods on a budget, increase physical activity, and create healthier school environments.

services.name: SNAP Outreach Program
services.description: Learn about SNAP Outreach efforts that inform and assist eligible Coloradans in accessing SNAP benefits through educational campaigns and partnerships.

services.name: ABAWD Work Requirement
services.description: Understand the Able‑Bodied Adults Without Dependents (ABAWD) work requirement for SNAP recipients, including eligibility and exemptions.

services.name: Summer EBT Program
services.description: Learn about Summer EBT, which provides $40 per eligible child per month during summer to help families purchase healthy foods when school is out.

services.name: Everyday Eats (Commodity Supplemental Food Program)
services.description: Access the Commodity Supplemental Food Program, also called Everyday Eats, which provides a monthly package of cereal, canned goods and dairy for Coloradans aged 60 and over.

services.name: The Emergency Food Assistance Program (TEFAP)
services.description: Get emergency food assistance through TEFAP, a federally funded program that distributes USDA foods to low‑income households in Colorado.

services.name: Disaster Feeding & Commodity Alert System
services.description: Learn how the Disaster Feeding and Commodity Alert System ensures USDA foods are available during natural disasters and provides alerts about commodity holds or recalls.

services.name: Local Food Purchase Assistance Program
services.description: Learn about the Local Food Purchase Assistance program, which used federal funds to purchase locally produced foods for distribution to underserved communities.

services.name: Child Nutrition and Schools Programs
services.description: Explore child nutrition programs like the National School Lunch Program, Summer Food Service Program and Child and Adult Care Food Program that provide nutritious meals to children and schools.

services.name: Energy EBT Program
services.description: Understand Energy EBT, a program that provides a one‑time $21 cash assistance payment to SNAP households with an elderly or disabled member to help pay energy costs.

services.name: Discount Admission for Colorado EBT Card Holders
services.description: Learn about discounts on museum, cultural and recreational admissions available to Colorado EBT card holders.

services.name: Aging and Disability Resources for Colorado (ADRC)
services.description: Connect with the ADRC for information and counseling on long‑term services and supports for older adults and people with disabilities.
